image_link_href_help: Adress the image link leads to.
image_alt_help: Alt text is displayed if the image cannot be loaded.
image_upload_help: JPEG, GIF or PNG image no larger than 1 MB.
link_open_help: Open the link in a new tab
file_upload_help: Upload multiple files at once from your device.
anchor_href_help: Consists of numbers, symbols and Latin letters. Anchors are used for page navigation.
anchor_title_help: The text of the popup hint when hovering over the anchor node
